title: El Piano - York
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Spanish
description: El Piano provides 100% vegan and gluten-free meals and has two other outlets (in Granada and Malaga). Mains are served in biodegradable pine boats--choose what you'd like with each portion. Wrapido (window service) is also available. The floor above the restaurant is divided into 3 private rooms that are available for guest overnight stays.
